profile.name: Rim Ba
profile.headline: Software Engineering Student | Building Human-Centered AI Solutions

overview.mission: Passionate software engineer focused on building AI-powered solutions that prioritize human values, privacy, and accessibility. Currently seeking Summer 2026 SWE internship opportunities to apply my skills in real-world impact.

projects.title: Styles By Sheyu
projects.tagline: Modern hair salon website with online booking
projects.description: Built a full-featured website for a local hair salon enabling online appointment booking, service browsing, and customer management.
highlights: Developed responsive front-end with modern UI/UX design
Implemented backend booking system with PHP and MySQL
Integrated payment processing for online deposits

projects.title: Displaced Documents App
projects.tagline: Digital archive platform for refugee documentation
projects.description: Developed at Fletcher IDEA Lab to help displaced persons securely store and access important documents digitally.
highlights: Designed secure document storage with encryption
Built user-friendly interface for non-technical users
Collaborated with policy researchers on privacy features
